scene.name: intro
scene.line: More of these old computers. Looks like about the same vintage as that stuff in the cave.

scene.name: vintage
scene.line: Oh, I don't know this make or model, but you can tell ... Check out these tubes — nobody uses these anymore. I'm not sure where they'd even get replacements, these days.

scene.name: screen
scene.line: Oh, wow — good eye! This is an X-Y monitor. It's ... they use them in oscilloscopes and arcade games. Or they used to, anyway ...

scene.name: rare
scene.line: It's rare stuff. Hey, is this like antiquing with Lysette for you? Ha ha.
I probably sound kind of ridiculous, waxing on about vacuum tubes and oscilloscopes ...
scene.option: It's good to have a passion.
I don't think I could talk about `anything` like that.

scene.name: shannon-passion
scene.line: Yeah, I guess it is. Someday you'll have to tell me what yours is.

scene.name: no-passion
scene.line: I bet you could. Someday maybe you'll bend `my` ear about ... whatever.
